message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. It's a great deal considering its value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I can offer $120, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $120 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $135. This is a fair price considering the product's value and my minimum threshold.
I'm still interested in the product, but $135 is a bit too high for me. I can offer $125, which is my final offer. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.

Bob, I understand you're firm on your offer, but $125 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130. This is my final offer. If we can't agree, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $127.50. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to pay more than that.
